name: Chomper Gets Trippy
description:
Chomper Gets Trippy is a platform game. The games includes five levels and the player must jump from platform to platform as the character Chomper.

Chomper must complete each level of the Psychedelic world without falling or he will have to start from the beginning. Chomper must collect all the orbs and reach the end goal in order to get Chomper back to the real world. Enjoy the psychedelia and get trippy with Chomper!

Credits:

I did not make any of the art assets. I placed them within my game and moved and manipulated them to create each level.  The art assets are made by:

Birch Tree from Proto Series by BitGem

Polygon Starter Pack by Synty Studios

3D Game Kit - Character Pack by Unity Technologies

Music: Psychedelic by Bensound
